  • Constructor Details

    • GuiInvalidInput

      public GuiInvalidInput(GuiFrame guiFrame, int sButtonEdge, int rButtonWidth, ActionListener listener)
      Constructs a mode for the GUI that informs the user if invalid input was given when adding or updating a contact.
      Parameters:
      guiFrame - The GUI that this mode is used in.
      sButtonEdge - Length of an edge of a square button.
      rButtonWidth - Width of a rectangle button.
      listener - ActionListener that handles button presses (GUI).
